name: Dimension Interlopers
description:
Battle your way through hordes of Interlopers.

What? You say you have seen this game before? try the new Caos Mode for a real challenge.

--- Controls ---

KeyboardXbox ControllerAttackSpaceASpecial AttackX BMoveWASD / Arrow KeysLeft Stick / D - Pad

-----------------------------------------------------

Made in a week and a half by this one indie developer.

This is the third game I have made and wanted to focus on Particle Systems, that is why I chose the classic Space Invaders for testing. While developing the game I thought adding some different features would be a great idea so it's not a complete clone.
